headline: Open source blueprint for zero trust principles applied to autonomous vehicles
description:
Last year, we - Capgemini, Arm, and NetFoundry - created a blueprint for building zero trust principles using open source technology into autonomous vehicles. The objective was to accelerate innovation in software and the transition to new digital business models while ensuring the highest functional safety, reliability, and security.

The main components including: - AWS Greengrass - an open-source edge runtime and cloud service that helps you build, deploy, and manage intelligent device software. - Arm Parsec - an open-source initiative to provide a common API to hardware security and cryptographic services in a platform-agnostic way - OpenZiti - an open-source project focused on bringing Zero Trust networking to any use case or application while closing all inbound ports from the internet.

We hope you find this interesting and please share any comments, questions, etc.

https://capgemini-engineering.com/us/en/insight/converging-on-a-zero-trust-blueprint/
headline_zh-Hans: 应用于自动驾驶汽车的零信任原则的开放源码蓝图
headline_zh-Hant: 應用於自動駕駛汽車的零信任原則的開放源碼藍圖
description_zh-Hans:
去年，我们--Capgemini、Arm和NetFoundry--创建了一个蓝图，利用开源技术在自动驾驶汽车中建立零信任原则。其目的是加速软件的创新和向新的数字商业模式的过渡，同时确保最高的功能安全性、可靠性和安全性。

主要组成部分包括。 - AWS Greengrass--一个开源的边缘运行时间和云服务，帮助你构建、部署和管理智能设备软件。 - Arm Parsec--一项开源计划，以平台无关的方式为硬件安全和加密服务提供通用API - OpenZiti - 一个开源项目，专注于为任何用例或应用带来零信任网络，同时关闭所有来自互联网的入站端口。

我们希望你觉得这很有趣，请分享任何评论、问题等。

https://capgemini-engineering.com/us/en/insight/converging-on-a-zero-trust-blueprint/
